articles.description: Vietnam’s Prime Minister has asked the State Bank of Vietnam (SBV) to pilot cryptocurrencies from 2021 until 2023.

articles.content: Luxury sports automaker Porsche is recalling roughly 43,000 of its Taycan electric cars worldwide over a bug that causes a sudden loss of power, the company said Friday. To fix the issue, youll have … [+2332 chars]

articles.title: All-Electric Successor To Volvo XC90 Will Get New Name - InsideEVs
articles.description: Next year, Volvo will introduce a successor to its flagship XC90 SUV. This new model will start a new car nomenclature.
articles.content: Next year, Volvo will introduce a successor to its flagship XC90 SUV, which will be based on an all-new Scalable Product Architecture (SPA2) platform, and available only in battery-electric version.… [+1466 chars]

articles.title: Royal Caribbean to host 600 first responders in cruise ship near building collapse site - NBC News
articles.description: A Royal Caribbean cruise ship will host hundreds of rescuers pouring into South Florida to search for victims at a fallen 12-story condominium building near Miami.
articles.content: With housing options dwindling, a cruise ship will host hundreds of rescuers pouring into South Florida from across the country as the search for victims continues at a fallen 12-story condominium bu… [+1120 chars]

articles.author: Chris Enloe
articles.title: Target slashes store hours in San Francisco over shoplifting, city's far-left DA blames police - TheBlaze
articles.description:
Out-of-control crime in San Francisco has forced retail giant Target to change their store hours, closing hours earlier than normal to fend of petty criminals who shoplift with near impunity.
